attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a British teenager who like the majority of  youths in the UK  is well behaved i'm fed up of having all teenagers being called yobs! We need groups being stopped in street corners, and them hanging outside mcdonalds accross the country! They don't need something to do, i'm a teenager and i can find lots to do! They think something to do is mug someone? Sign this petition if you want gobby youths off the streets ( including their parents!)

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
